message.content:
cs.CR, cs.IR, cs.DC, cs.DB, cs.SE 

This paper discusses the challenges of traceability and integrity in supply chains and proposes a trust management framework using blockchain technology. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CR (Cryptography and Security), followed by cs.IR (Information Retrieval), as the paper also discusses the limitations of current reputation systems. The paper also involves the use of smart contracts, which falls under cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) and cs.DB (Databases). Finally, the paper proposes a solution for supply chain management, which falls under cs.SE (Software Engineering).
